name: CoS, Out of Time
description:
Original name was Hop, Skip and Jump. Eventually, I swapped it to Out of Time. 

I have fixed the enemy pathing, and attacks. I made the enemy more aggressive, so it makes the game more challenging. I still need to setup some additional features, but so far the key mechanics are working.

Move Keys:

A, S, D, W

Left Mouse Button Click, allows you to attack. 

Shift allows you to sprint.

Space Bar allows you to jump.

Avoid the enemies, as they will reset your level.

Holding the Right Mouse Button down allows you to manipulate the camera. This works better for controller, rather than console.
